description: Numbers n such that n divides the (left) concatenation of all numbers <= n written in base 3 (most significant digit on right).
comments: This sequence differs from A061956 in that all least significant zeros are removed before concatenation.No more terms < 10^7. [Lars Blomberg, Sep 02 2011]
